sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Nlq capablity currently does not require training, thus setting the state of nlq solutions to "Solution Complete" in ml_solution table which overwrites default value "Waiting for Training"</description>
        <name>Set nlq solutions for prediction only</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var nlqPrefix = 'nlq_model_info';
	var mlSolutionGR = new GlideRecord('ml_solution');
	mlSolutionGR.addQuery('state','waiting_for_training');
	mlSolutionGR.query();
	while (mlSolutionGR.next()) { 
		var solutionName = mlSolutionGR.getValue('solution_name').substring(0,nlqPrefix.length);
		if(solutionName==nlqPrefix){
			mlSolutionGR.setValue('state','solution_complete');
			mlSolutionGR.setWorkflow(false);
			mlSolutionGR.update();
		}
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-04 05:57:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ae44cf9353332010df5fddeeff7b1255</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set nlq solutions for prediction only</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Natural Language Query" source="com.snc.nlq">bb8b74643c35311068bcf327dfe37fe1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ae44cf9353332010df5fddeeff7b1255</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-05-05 06:52:49</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set nlq solutions for prediction only
